T02D1821:261a-1: #// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
T02D1821:261b-0: bla ma dam @261b pa la btud de //
T02D1821:261b-1: de yi man ngag ji bzhin du //
T02D1821:261b-2: gtor ma'i chog bri bar bya //
T02D1821:261b-3: de la tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D1821:261b-4: las bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D1821:261b-5: bar du gcod pa rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D1821:261b-6: gtor ma nar mar byed par 'dod pas srod kyi
T02D1821:261b-8: bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu dang ldan pa'i gtor mas snod mdzes bkang ste /
T02D1821:261b-9: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed la /
T02D1821:261b-10: de nas stong pa nyid du mos par bya ste /
T02D1821:261b-11: de'i 'og tu h'um zhes brjod pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02D1821:261b-14: phyi rol du me lce 'bar ba dang /
T02D1821:261b-15: rnam par 'khrigs par bsams shing nang du rin po chi'i khang ba nyams dga' ba bsam par bya'o //
T02D1821:261b-16: der bdag nyid skad cig tsam gyis lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms te rdo rje gsum dang /
T02D1821:261b-18: cod pan gyi lha dran pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1821:261b-19: de nas rdo rje thal mo snying gar phye la gtor mar h'um a'a: aom bam bsams te /
T02D1821:261b-20: h'um chu ltar zhu bas kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1821:261b-21: a'a: zhugs dri phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1821:261b-22: aom zhub ro phun sum tshogs pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1821:261b-23: de nas aom gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi
T02D1821:261b-24: bdud rtsi bkug ste gnyis su med par byas la
T02D1821:261b-25: 'bru gsum brjod pas brtan par bya'o //
T02D1821:261b-26: de nas bdag gi snying ga'i 'od zer gyis sems
T02D1821:261b-27: can thams cad dam yi dags kyi tshogs bkug ste
T02D1821:261b-28: / de dag gi snying ga dang spyi bor lha
T02D1821:261b-29: dang bla ma rigs kyi bdag po bsgom par bya'o
T02D1821:261b-30: / // de nas nang du bkug la thams cad kyi lce la h'um las rdo rje bskyed /
T02D1821:261b-31: aom gyis nor bu bskyed la /
T02D1821:261b-32: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am
T02D1821:261b-33: a'a dya nu ta nna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um
T02D1821:261b-34: phat sv'a h'a / zhes brjod nas nor bu 'od
T02D1821:261b-35: zer gyis ljags kyi lce'u chung drang ba bzhin du
T02D1821:261b-36: so sor thim pas thams cad gnyis med kyi ye
T02D1821:261b-37: shes dang ldan par bsams te /
T02D1821:261b-38: yid 'byung ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyi kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02D1821:261b-39: de nas mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang bcas la /
T02D1821:261b-40: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1821:261b-41: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02D1821:261b-42: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1821:261b-43: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02D1821:261b-44: ngo bo gnyis med gnas med par //
T02D1821:261b-45: de ltar chos rnams shes nas kyang //
T02D1821:261b-46: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D1821:261b-47: 'o na kyang sangs rgyas rigs su skye //
T02D1821:261b-48: zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos bshad par bya'o //
T02D1821:261b-65: ma ma sarbas ba ri war na sarba sa tva na nytsa /
T02D1821:262a-6: aa ta pu shpam ku ru /
T02D1821:262a-7: sarba pra yar ksha ku ru sva' t'a /
T02D1821:262a-9: shu pa tsi tta ka ra /
T02D1821:262a-12: khyed rnams kun la gsol ba ni //
T02D1821:262a-13: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang //
T02D1821:262a-14: gnas kyi dbang phyug skye bor bcas //
T02D1821:262a-15: gdon nad la sogs zhib dang //
T02D1821:262a-16: tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang //
T02D1821:262a-17: bkra shes phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02D1821:262a-19: ces 'dod pa'i don la sogs ba gdab ste /
T02D1821:262a-20: sems can thams cad sdig med cing //
T02D1821:262a-21: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub byed pa'i //
T02D1821:262a-22: lam de nyid du zhugs nas kyang //
T02D1821:262a-23: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs gnas la ni //
T02D1821:262a-24: da lta nyid du gnas par shog / ces pas dge pa yongs su bsngos la //
T02D1821:262a-25: aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol //
T02D1821:262a-26: bdag drin bla ma'i rgyud dang ni //
T02D1821:262a-27: blo dman rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D1821:262a-28: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag bzhin //
T02D1821:262a-29: gtor ma'i chog bris pa yin //
T02D1821:262a-31: lam la gnas dang 'bras myang gis //
T02D1821:262a-32: tshogs rdzogs sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1821:262a-33: slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa yin //
